DataElement.preferredName: Ped-PRO-CTCAE Past 7 Days How Often Constipation Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response in the past 7 days about how often they have problems with not being able to poop, using a 4-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Ped-PRO-CTCAE Past Week How Often Constipation Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A measurement system that characterized the frequency, severity, interference,and presence/absence of symptomatic toxicities that include pain, fatigue, nausea, and cutaneous side effects such as rash and hand-foot syndrome, all toxicities that can be meaningfully reported from the patient prespective. The pediatric module permits self-reporting by children and adolescents ages 7-17 years.:The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about how often an individual has or had constipation._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A measurement system that characterized the frequency, severity, interference,and presence/absence of symptomatic toxicities that include pain, fatigue, nausea, and cutaneous side effects such as rash and hand-foot syndrome, all toxicities that can be meaningfully reported from the patient prespective. The pediatric module permits self-reporting by children and adolescents ages 7-17 years.

Concepts.definition: A measurement system that characterized the frequency, severity, interference, and presence/absence of symptomatic toxicities that include pain, fatigue, nausea, and cutaneous side effects such as rash and hand-foot syndrome, all toxicities that can be meaningfully reported from the patient perspective. The pediatric module permits self-reporting by children and adolescents ages 7-17 years.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added "Sometimes" to represent the MSAS value domain.ghd.01.27.15

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened almost all of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened almost all of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).
